Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class GUI extends Object implements View
Implements the View interface for a GUI client.

Using launch(), the toolkit is initialized and the application is started in a new thread, since Application.launch(Class, String...) blocks execution. Then each method communicates with the application through GuiApplication.afterInit(Consumer), which is a wrapper for Platform.runLater(Runnable).
